ComicInfo.Summary:
The green doors to Rebecca's sensual suburban universe swing wide open once again. In a world where no wife goes unpunished and playing naughtily with others is encouraged, goodness and badness intertwine, and sensuality is its own reward.
Oh, but what if Hubby should walk in?
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:03:32. [CVDB316105]
